revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ZyXEL |model=PLA5236 |asin=B01MYOFJK4 |newegg=2WG-005R-00010 |fcc_date=01/18/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=Powerline Access Point |fcc_id=I88PLA5236 |ic_id=2468C-PLA5236 |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.15 |pwr_conn=AC (direct) |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM47189B0;BCM47189B0KRFBG, HN1616 P20, 588300-07 P3A W; |cpu1_cspeed=900 |cpu2_brand=Broadcom |cpu2_model=BCM60350;BCM60350KRFBG, TK1551 P11, P480-01 P3 W; |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L25635FMI-10G |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W631GG6KB-15 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM47189B0;BCM47189B0KRFBG, HN1616 P20, 588300-07 P3A W; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model=B50212E;BROADCOM(R), B50212E, B1KMLG, TD1552 P21, 560699 1 W; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |flags=HomePlug AV2 1000, 256QAM, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=ZyxelXXXXXX, ZyxelXXXXXX.speed, |default_ip=192.168.1.3 |default_pass=1234 }} {{TagLine|1000 Mbps Powerline AC900 Wireless Extender}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.zyxel.com/us/en/products_services/1000-Mbps-Powerline-AC900-Wireless-Extender-PLA5236}} The device uses Broadcom BCM60350 as the HomePlug controller. The ZyXEL PLA5236KIT contains this [[ZyXEL PLA5236]] and a [[ZyXEL PLA5206v2]]. Wireless Modes: *Speed mode: up to 867 Mbps for 5 GHz
:• '''867Mbps''' - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.) = '''''900 Mbps'' class'''
* Range mode: up to 400 Mbps for 2.4 GHz
:• '''400Mbps''' - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM)
*Mix mode: up to 200 Mbps for 2.4 GHz & 433 Mbps for 5 GHz
:• '''433Mbps''' - 1SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''200Mbps''' - 1SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM)
* Web GUI: http://zyxelsetup
